list_variables.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy.             You can use the Ref function to             specify an AWS::SNS::Topic             resource.
list_variables.name: Topics
list_variables.type: A list of Amazon SNS topics ARNs

variables.description: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS             topics.
variables.name: PolicyDocument
